creator: jubelo
description:
{RHelp Topic{W: mmtell {x

{Wmmtell{x <player>@<game> <argument>
     This will send the tell <argument> directly to <player> @ <game>.

mmtell is used to communicate over the grapevine.haus MultiMUD chat network.

You can toggle this feature off and on by using the {Wtoggle{x command.
